          <title>
            <string language="en">Types of point defects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Punktdefekte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de défauts de point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de defeitos do ponto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di difetti del punto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι ατελειών σημείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos de defectos de la punta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three kinds of point defects: (a) vacancy, (b) substitution defect and (c) interstitial defect.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">point defects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substitution defect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacancy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Arten Punktdefekte: 
(a) defect freie Stelle, (b) Ersatzdefekt und (c) Interstitial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois genres de défauts
de point : (a) l'offre d'emploi, (b) défaut de substitution et 
(c) interstitiel désertent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três tipos de defeitos 
do ponto: (a) a vacância, (b) defeito da substituição e (c) 
interstitial defect.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre generi di difetti 
del punto: (a) la vacanza, (b) difetto della sostituzione e (c) 
interstitial defect.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρία είδη ατελειών 
σημείου: (α) κενό, (β) ατέλεια αντικατάστασης και (γ) 
διάμεση ατέλεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres clases de defectos 
de la punta: (a) la vacante, (b) defecto de la substitución y 
(c) intersticial deserta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punktdefekte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ersatzdefekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freie Stelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">défauts de point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">défaut de substitution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre d'emploi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">defeitos do ponto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">defecto de la substitución</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vacante</string>
